scripts.test: npm run yaspeller-ru && npm run yaspeller-uk
scripts.yaspeller-selective: if [ "${TRAVIS}" = "true" -a "${TRAVIS_PULL_REQUEST}" != "false" ]; then CHECK_FILES=$(echo "${CHANGED_FILES}" | egrep "\.${LANG}\.md$"); if [ "x${CHECK_FILES}" = "x" ]; then echo "There is nothing to check"; exit 0; fi; fi; CHECK_FILES=${CHECK_FILES} npm run yaspeller-lang
scripts.yaspeller-lang: r=0; $(npm bin)/yaspeller -l ${LANG} -e .${LANG}.md --dictionary .slang.${LANG}.json --report console,html --max-requests 3 ${CHECK_FILES:-.}; r=$?; mv -f yaspeller_report.html yaspeller_report.${LANG}.html; exit ${r}
